main_definition: The United States Postal Service (USPS) is an independent agency of the executive branch of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal services in the country.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to the United States Postal Service
meanings_and_examples.example: I have a package being shipped by USPS.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom referring to something that is reliable and consistent
meanings_and_examples.example: The USPS never fails to deliver my mail on time, it's very reliable!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in the context of logistics or shipping to refer to services provided by the US Postal Service
meanings_and_examples.example: Our company uses USPS for all our international shipments.
